channel.description: Recent content in #comics on Micro blog

item.title: CultureWorldMap
item.description: I hate f*king ~fairyland~ bi tools (lie) # My Tableau CultureWorldMap How do Europeans call something that is too far away # Some maps by Yanko Tsvetkov # Yanko Tsvetkov atlasofprejudice.

item.title: Random sketch comics
item.description: Degradation of drawing # How I used to draw comics 8-12 years ago # How I used to draw comics 4-5 years ago # PDF file How I used to draw comics 2-3 years ago # Now # The main aim was to create a short, monochromatic fragment-strip story, without text that could be read in any order, and imagine a story based on the reader’s mind/personal interpretation.

item.title: Books
item.description: Books COVID-19: The Great Reset “Americanah” book “Americanah” by Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie is a highly acclaimed novel that has received widespread recognition for its nuanced and insightful examination of race, identity, and immigration.
